attributes.action: show remorse for the damage he has done to this country by resigning forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM is yet to apologise for reducing this country to the status of a banana republic. He and his government have wreaked untold damage on the economy. They have sold our sovereignty  out to an undemocratic European superstate. In more enlightened times he would have been put on trial for treason. Far from benefiting under this Labour govt, the pensioners and poor of this country will be considerably poorer for years to come.

rejection.details: I'm sorry but we have to reject your petition again. This is because it makes reference to the Labour Government and is therefore party political. The rest of your petition is fine. Please resubmit, removing reference to 'Labour' and we will approve.
